title: The Interview!
description: A Visual Novel of my own creation. It has a short story component that brings the player to a short three question quiz. Depending on your answers, the story will resolve in one of four possible endings. The Story, Art, and Voices were of my own creation.

title: The Contagion Boutique
description: A template for an e-commerece on-line store. This project was a group effort, and my work was focused on the front end, to which I created all the art and graphics used on the site, including the products that I photoshoped. The purpose of the site was to be more of a template, so the content currently published on the deployed site are pure works of satire and fall under fair use.

title: Spotify Lyric Webplayer
description: A music player for Spotify Premium users that pulls up and displays the lyrics for the current song playing. This project was a group effort, and my work was mostly on the front end. I chose the color/design theme, and I created custom art for the page as well. The main background graphic as well as the playback buttons I created using Photoshop.
